description: Common Voice English smoke slice - 15 fixed clips covering accent/noise variance for ASR regression testing

source.name: Mozilla Common Voice
source.citation: Ardila et al., Common Voice: A Massively-Multilingual Speech Corpus, LREC 2020

license.name: Creative Commons Zero 1.0
license.notes: Audio is CC0. IMPORTANT: Do not attempt to identify speakers. Do not redistribute the dataset.

download.notes: Requires accepting terms on Hugging Face. Use stage_commonvoice.py to download selected clips.

text_normalization.notes: CV transcripts are often punctuated/cased. Normalize both reference and hypothesis to lowercase without punctuation for fair WER comparison.

sample_source.notes: Fixed 15 clips selected for deterministic regression testing. Clips chosen for accent/quality variance.

meta.notes: Messy real-world audio with accent variance, mic variance, and background noise. Complements clean LibriSpeech for realistic ASR evaluation.
